post.body: are you coming home tonight?
i find that playing games or anything with video are good for battery draining. or leaving the screen on all the time
or you could just turn it off
omg already? You must be making great time :D
will do
tomorrowwwwwwww
re: arrested development I toldddd youuuuu. just wait til the end D:
lolllll ok
watch twitter make a liar out of me and you get this immediately :|
Mom is here with me. Were baking up a storm lol
Dad went to work :( he was giving us the play by play while he drove, all the streams flooding and trees down.
Lmao @hargreeves you're no fun
PEOPLE ARE DRIVING LIKE ASSHOLES >:-O
goddamn you know its cold when there's ice INSIDE the car.
this suuuuucks. Truck in front of me keeps sliding :(
Adorable teeny tiny christmas tree omg I love it.
OMG they just said not to expect power back until Monday. We actually got really lucky on this one.
Noo read my lj. State of emergency- no libraries.
wowwwww 350,000 people in Mass. out of power still. Millions of dollars in damage. And they say is all gonna freeze over and get worse u ...
the power is back on! *hugs internet*
